Message: If you don't believe it, I won't force you. As long as you help me...
But to give you a quick summary : The society that we know will probably not hold much longer.
And we are planning on accelerating its fall.

Reactions: I'll spare you the details, but basically, no matter what we do, the fall is inevitable. And the longer it akes to arrive, the harder it will be to get back up from it.

Message: I will recontact you soon, I'll need you.
